Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Wabash
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Wabash, 13th, and Indiana due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Wabash, 13th, and Indiana due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Wabash.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/ Wabash
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/ Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/ Wabash.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
